question: My 4 year old son was diagnosed with juvenile diabetes 10 days ago... Since we have been home his insulin doses have been changed several times due to repeated lows (62-80)...  I am TERRIFIED of a severe hypoglycemic attack..  I am comfortable using glucagon if needed but my diabetes educator told me that he would definitely need glucagon at some point..  This has totally freaked me out!   I can't even sleep for fear he will go into a diabetic coma and I will not know..  Any advice???????
title: Scared for son
